email_body: i think you're absolutely right about q/u. again just a question of when to put it on. Seems as if I'm always on the offer of that spread. yesterday i had a 4.5 offer all day and i think i got 50 or so. i can almost leg it better by buying winter and selling summer and the j/q spread. i would like to see it widen another penny before stepping in and i think with the weakness in the winter and relative weakness of cal 2, on any rally that could happen. was that you on the q/u/v fly yesterday?
